decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): 4351-BPG-XX-XX-DR-B-1016-S01 (Location and Site Plan),  SB8303 - 153 -159 ST ALBANS (Existing East Elevation), SB8303 - 153 -159 ST ALBANS (Existing South Elevation), SB8303 - 153 -159 ST ALBANS (Existing West Elevation), SB8303 - 153 -159 ST ALBANS (Existing North Elevation), 4351-BPG-XX-XX-DR-A-2601-S01 (Proposed East Elevation), 4351-BPG-XX-XX-DR-A-2603-S01 (Proposed West Elevation), 4351-BPG-XX-XX-DR-A-2602-S01 (Proposed North and South Elevations), 4351-BPG-XX-XX-DR-A-5016-S01 (Proposed Window Type Schedule), Design and Access Statement dated March 2023.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - section 12.
description: Replacement of existing single-glazed aluminium windows on a block of flats with double-glazed UPVC casement windows to all elevations  (including 1st and 2nd floor communal windows). (London Borough of Ealing - Regulation 3)
